quote: Third-Party Service Providers: Twitter uses a variety of third-party services to help provide our Services, such as hosting our various blogs and wikis, and to help us understand the use of our Services, such as Google Analytics. These third-party service providers may collect information sent by your browser as part of a web page request, such as cookies or your IP address.
title: Third party cookies

tosdr.tldr: Twitter uses third-party services that may collect your information, using cookies for instance. Twitter uses Google Analytics.
